name: Magnetic-Entanglement
description:
-This is a small puzzle game demo where you contoll te maze instead of the player , it was made in 3 days for Mini-jam 101,If you like the idea and want to see more of it feel free to give a rating!

Controls:

-Start: SpaceBar or SouthButton on a controller(A/X)

-Restart: R or EastButton on a controller(B/O)

-Rotate the maze: A&D or arrow keys or D-pad and LeftStick on a controller

-Lock/Unlock the ball: Righ mouse button or right bumper on a controller

Credits:

-The sounds used are from OpenGameArt and the camera movment was made using MilkShake Asset.
